/ui/pivot_grid/ui.pivot_grid.data_controller.js

addAdditionalTotalHeaderItems function - added dataField.dataField === 'startingBalance'
to show row totals at the bottom

#src/node_modules/devextreme/core/utils/ajax.js
sendRequest function - added
var ajaxStrategy;
if (ajaxStrategy && !options.responseType && !options.upload) {
    return ajaxStrategy(options)
}
and
setStrategy: function(s) {
    ajaxStrategy = s
}
to keep the functionality of cancelling the previous odata requests
